situation: H was restless and found it difficult to concentrate during a writing task, causing frustration and incomplete work.
action: The TA employed a multisensory approach, where H used typing on a keyboard with word prediction software to assist with his writing. She allowed H frequent movement breaks to release built-up energy and refocus.
effect: H completed the writing task with fewer errors thanks to the supportive technology and managed his restlessness with the movement breaks. This method led to better focus and a sense of achievement in his writing endeavors.
